item.title: Sending
item.description: Working with E-POST Sending With our Connector 365 E-POST App* you can send pos. sales invoices, pos. credit notes, issued reminders, quotes and sales orders. However, in our application example we will focus on invoices. All other document types can be sent in the same way. First select the invoice you want to send. The function for sending letters by post can be found under “Print/Send” in the menu bar. Open it and select “Send as letter” to open the dialog for sending letters.

item.title: Archive
item.description: Working with the E-POST API Archive After sending the invoice, you can check the status in the joblist. This can be found in the factbox area directly on the overview of the documents. Here you can see when the letter was sent, who sent it and what the status is. The job list provides you with a detailed overview of all letters that have been sent. It shows which options were used and displays any error messages that may have occurred.
